entry.title: State of NumFOCUS: A year in review and a look forward at 2018

Description

A year in review and a look forward at 2018

entry.title: Keynote: The NumFOCUS Ecosystem
entry.summary:
Description

The NumFOCUS Foundation is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization which supports several open source Python packages, R tools, and the Julia language; fosters diversity within the open source data science community, and produces the internationally acclaimed PyData conference series. Find out how NumFOCUS works.
